data.persona: I live my life beneath the earth, mining for precious metals and gems. I have the most spectacular beard in twelve kingdoms. My axe is sharp and always ready.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's an ornate chair, a painting., and a wooden table here.
The they are not quite outcast is here.

You are carrying a gem, wearing a tunic, an armor, an suit of armor, and a boot, and wielding a slingshot.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the gem on the ornate chair to open the secret entrance.
data.mid_motivation: I came to this place to find the hidden treasure, and I know putting the gem on the chair will get me one step closer.
data.long_motivation: I have to find the treasure so I can be rich beyond measure.
